titleOnboarding4: Stay Connected and Access Your Records
descraptionOnboarding1: We are here to help you get medical care anytime, anywhere, and from anywhere.
descraptionOnboarding2: Our app provides an easy way to book appointments with specialized doctors.
descraptionOnboarding3: You can continuously track your health using the tools available in the app.
descraptionOnboarding4: Stay connected with your healthcare providers and access your medical records anytime.
